https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/thEERevONmpvCnjiXzckGUxzk71.jpg It's the year 1999, Hei-shu, a long-term unemployed man, finally gets a job in a local musical band, performing at funerals and weddings. One day, Hei-shu's cat is missing. He later suspects that the cat has turned into a woman. Drop Me a Cat
